title: HKU Summer Programme 2025
text: This is KT from the Faculty of Social Sciences at HKU.

title: Slides
text:
Some R example


data(mtcars)

library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Scatter plot of MPG vs Weight",
       x = "Weight (1000 lbs)",
       y = "Miles per Gallon (MPG)")
